title: End Season reward shit
body: I've seen a bunch of old ass threads, and either; I'm r%%%%%ed, or it I'm r%%%%%ed, but if I get Diamond in Ranked 3v3, will I get a Diamond border in normal 5v5s? Or no border. I want ppl in norms to think I'm cool.

replies.body: We haven't announced rewards for the end of this season, so I couldn't say for sure until it's [announced](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).  If it's for this season, the border would depend on the mode you are queuing for per the [preseason faq](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

rofl

just use icon
problem solved
